sentence.text: We report the identification of mutations in protein processing involved in protein targeting to mitochondrion in 17 patients from four families affected with cerebellar ataxia, including the large Lebanese family previously described with autosomal recessive cerebellar ataxia and short stature of Norman type and localized to chromosome 9q34 (OMIM #213200).

entity.text: protein processing involved in protein targeting to mitochondrion
